topic.title: Configuring and Extending OxygenXML
topic.shortdesc: It is almost trivially easy to configure OxygenXML to enable editing of new map and topic types. OxygenXML also provides a number of extension facilities you can use to extend the editor.

p.draft-comment: talk about OxygenXML configuration, namely deploying vocabulary plugins to Oxygen's toolkit. Provide an overview of extension mechanisms in Oxygen.
